wikipedia_page.main: David Vallance Robertson (16 August 1906 – ?) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in Scottish football for Tranent Juniors, Rosslyn Juniors, St Mirren, Celtic, Clydebank and Cowdenbeath and in non-League football for York City.
